title: HOUR 2 - Joel Klatt, Peter King
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Joel Klatt, Peter King
description:
In hour 2, Colin explains that Tua Tagovailoa is exactly what he's always been. A good player with average attributes that can excel with weapons around. But that doesn't mean Miami Dolphins fans should expect everyone else has to buy into him. Joel Klatt joins the show to talk NCAAF and Peter King joins to talk Green Bay not making any moves before the trade deadline and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
